Template.Description: Creates an organelle module to which you can then add organelles from collections.
Template.TargetFolderHint: Choose the organelle folder of a package as target folder.

MacroDefinition.Name: PACKAGE_NAME
MacroDefinition.Description: The name of the package. Must not contain whitespace.

MacroDefinition.Name: UND_PACKAGE_NAME
MacroDefinition.Description: The name of the package without prefix like 'vvv_'. Must not contain whitespace.

MacroDefinition.Name: MODULE_NAME
MacroDefinition.Description: The name of the organelle module. Must not contain whitespace.

MacroDefinition.Name: UND_MODULE_NAME
MacroDefinition.Description: The name of the organelle module without prefix like vvv_. Must not contain whitespace.

MacroDefinition.Name: COPYRIGHT
MacroDefinition.Description: The copyright string for the file headers.

MacroDefinition.Name: COMPANY
MacroDefinition.Description: The company name (for the file information on Windows).

MacroDefinition.Name: MOD_PROD_NAME
MacroDefinition.Description: The name of the module as product (for the file information on Windows).
